channel.title: How do i place a object like an altar
channel.description:
I looking this for months...
how do i place a new object in my ValtorScape v1.1 the source that i use is Pimpscape...
i need to have build like a new house that is than the startplace... and i wanna have portals in that. you dont have to script 4 me ;D. i only wanne know how to do it...

item.title: How do i place a object like an altar
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

[quote=“supra s, post:4, topic:147622”]search for : AddGlobalObject(
or public void NewObjects()
then you see somting like this :

	AddGlobalObject(3487, 3477, 849, -1, 10);//spear row

explenation:

//X Y ID DIR 10 (Dir, 0=West -1=North -2=East -3=South) [/quote]

Some servers don’t have global object working, so you may need to add using fedxers tut

Read full topic
